page.title: 12CHERYL_ANNE'S DAY
page.content: My name is Cheryl_Anne Hutton. I am 11 years old. I live in the village of {Newmills.}I get up at ten to eight on} a school morning,get washed and dressed in{my school uniform _ grey or {navy skirt, white blouse, black {sweater and white socks.}I do not have any breakfast.I watch television until ten to nine, when my mum takes my little brother and myself to{St Serfs {School}in High Valleyfield. We go by car as it is too far to walk in the morning.When school starts we say prayers. Break is from 10.30 to 10.45 and lunch is from 12.30 to 1.30.School finishes at 3.15. I collect my brother and go to my Auntie's She takes us home, when my big brother is in.After school, I play with my friends. At night I go to High Valleyfield to the {Youth Centre,}where we have a disco.After that I go home to bed.
